    level="1"
    right="Item 18"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Purloining Cloak](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2401)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="No Alignment" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Intelligent" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=280" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 196 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Perception** +30; [precise](/Rules.aspx?ID=411) vision 30 feet, [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) hearing 30 feet

**Communication** speech ([Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) and two other languages, usually regional and ancestral)

**Skills** [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +31, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +31, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +31

**Int** +5, **Wis** +5, **Cha** +5

**Will** +30 

</column>

---        

Each _purloining cloak_ is a [_mercurial mantle_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1067) once worn by a legendary thief or two. The cloak became infused with a daredevil spirit and a penchant for high-stakes thievery. If its owner isn't willing to partake in such activities, the cloak tries to convince them to sell or give it to someone who will. A purloining cloak can use tendrils of its cloth to attempt [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) checks to [Palm an Object](/Actions.aspx?ID=67) or [Steal](/Actions.aspx?ID=68), proudly offering you its loot later. In addition to those of a _mercurial mantle_, a _purloining cloak_ has the following activations.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))    **Effect** The cloak casts 2nd-rank [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1568) on you, usually to your specifications. However the cloak can choose the appearance of the illusion for you.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))    **Effect** The cloak assesses the price of valuables it can see. This valuation doesn't include the value of features the cloak can't discern, such as magical properties.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
